sentences.en: a book that will challenge your preconceptions about rural life
sentences.cn: 一本改变你对农村生活成见的书

sentences.en: a population drift away from rural areas
Agriculture forms the backbone of the rural economy.
sentences.cn: 农业是农村经济的基础。

sentences.en: As rural factories shed labour, people drift towards the cities.
sentences.cn: 由于农村的工厂纷纷裁员，人们逐渐流向城市。

sentences.en: damage to both urban and rural environments
Desegregation may be harder to enforce in rural areas.
sentences.cn: 要废除农村地区的种族隔离可能会更困难一些。

sentences.en: In France patois was spoken in rural, less developed regions.
sentences.cn: 在法国，欠发达的农村地区说方言。

sentences.en: In rural France, English language magazines are rather hard to come by.
sentences.cn: 在法国乡村，很难找到英语杂志。

sentences.en: In the Balearics pockets of rural life and inland villages are undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 在巴利阿里群岛上，零星散布在岛内的村庄和那里的生活平静而祥和。

sentences.en: Rural communities are widely separated and often small.
sentences.cn: 乡村村落彼此离得很远，而且通常规模很小。

sentences.en: School crime and violence cuts across urban, rural and suburban areas.
sentences.cn: 城市、乡村和郊区都出现了校园犯罪和校园暴力现象。

sentences.en: The recycling scheme gets its first try-out in rural Dorset.
sentences.cn: 这些再循环方案在多塞特郡的农村地区首先试用。

sentences.en: This is early-20th-century rural Sussex, when horses still pulled the plough.
sentences.cn: 这是20世纪早期的萨塞克斯乡村，那时还是用马拉犁。

words.tran_cn: 田园生活者；熟悉农事者
田园风光；田园风味；田园生活

phrases.tran_cn: n. 农村信用合作社，农村信用社
田园生活；乡村生活；农村生活

trans.tran_en: happening in or relating to the countryside, not the city
